text:
Dear Harry:
Oar letters obviously crossed in the mails -
at least we are thinking of the same things at
the same time.
In planning the foil meeting - on the McLuhan
project - keep in mind that September 1 catched
academic people in the middle of their vacation
period - August 10th — September 20th — so I
would have it not earlier than October 1.
Otherwise, you will probably have trouble
getting all of the people whom you want.
We are in the nrcHca- midst of packing to return to
Iowa - which we do inx a week. Terrible business
this packinglJJ
Best
RECfc? v to
naeb headquarters
jUN 1 1959
A IN
l
